/** * @deprecated * The ASObjectList interface provides the abstraction of an * ordered collection of AS nodes, without defining or constraining how this * collection is implemented. ASObjectList objects in the DOM * AS are live. *

See also the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Abstract Schemas and Load and Save Specification. */
unit.class: public interface ASObjectList { /** * The number of ASObjects in the list. The range of valid * child node indices is 0 to length-1 inclusive. */ public int getLength (); /** * Returns the indexth item in the collection. The index * starts at 0. If index is greater than or equal to the * number of nodes in the list, this returns null. * @param index index into the collection. * @return The ASObject at the indexth position * in the ASObjectList, or null if that is * not a valid index. */ public ASObject item ( int index ) ; }
